mapper.select:
select
from stat_teacher_student
nf >= #{startYear} AND nf <= #{endYear}
order by nf ASC

SELECT SUM(bdrs) AS rs FROM stat_teacher_student AS a, ref_org_type AS b
a.jgbh = b.jgbh AND nf >= #{query.startYear} AND nf <= #{query.endYear}

SELECT ANY_VALUE(jgbh) AS jgbh, ANY_VALUE(jgmc) AS jgmc, SUM(bdrs) AS rs FROM stat_teacher_student
nf = #{query.endYear} AND jgbh IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY jgbh ORDER BY rs DESC

SELECT SUM(sdrs) AS rs FROM stat_teacher_student AS a, ref_org_type AS b
a.jgbh = b.jgbh AND nf >= #{query.startYear} AND nf <= #{query.endYear}

SELECT ANY_VALUE(jgbh) AS jgbh, ANY_VALUE(jgmc) AS jgmc, SUM(sdrs) AS rs FROM stat_teacher_student
nf = #{query.endYear} AND jgbh IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY jgbh ORDER BY rs DESC
